name: Panacea (Waifusoft)
description:
You play as Kurtz, a young man whose childhood love has taken gravely ill. Not one to stand idly by, Kurtz takes up his father's armor and ventures beyond his childhood home in search of the precious ingredients needed for the cure.

𝓟𝓪𝓷𝓪𝓬𝓮𝓪 is a JRPG in the vein of NES classics like Dragon Quest and Final Fantasy.   Averaging in length between 2-5 hours, we hoped to scratch the classic JRPG itch in between busy schedules with our first ever game. 

⚔️ NES Style Graphics

⚔️ Original Characters and Story

⚔️ Turn Based Battle System

⚔️ 8-Bit Soundtrack

⚔️ Short playtime for hectic schedules

⚔️ Controller Support*

⚔️ 100% FREE

We have no website, Twitter, or the like.  Please comment below if you find any bugs, errors or just want to say hello.

Thank you to all the creators of free and paid resources used to create this game (and credited within it).

We hope you enjoy playing 𝓟𝓪𝓷𝓪𝓬𝓮𝓪. 

*Tested using Retroflag USB SNES gamepad

Initial release date 3/24/23
